title: DNS attack
extract: A DNS attack is an exploit in which an attacker takes advantage of vulnerabilities in the domain name system (DNS). ... DNS is a protocol that translates a user-friendly domain name, like WhatIs.com, into the computer-friendly IP address 206.19.49.154.
extract_html: A DNS attack is an exploit in which an attacker takes advantage of vulnerabilities in the domain name system (DNS). ... DNS is a protocol that translates a user-friendly domain name, like WhatIs.com, into the computer-friendly IP address 206.19.49.154.
